active send sms message SMS location WhereRU Enter This app can respond to SMS messages with a given text by sending the actual gps location back to the sender. Trigger text Enter the text, on which a response should be triggered: Automatic responses are activated. We will respond to SMS messages with the text Respond to: No automatic responses will be sent. Requests so far No Requests so far Select this, to activate automatic responses: request for location current location sent to %1$s current network location sent to %1$s no gps fix to send location to %1$s no gps enabled for request, please enable gps and send again from history request aborted location request from %1$s http://maps.google.de/maps?q=%1$s,%2$s ; Accuracy: %3$s m ; Speed: %4$s m/s ; Age: %5$s s Last network location: http://maps.google.de/maps?q=%1$s,%2$s ; Accuracy: %3$s m ; Speed: %4$s m/s ; Age: %5$s s Unable to determine location. trying to send location to %1$s active Time to gps fix How long should I try to determine the actual gps location before sending back a response? Fall back to network location Enable this, to respond with the last known network location when either gps is disabled or there was no gps fix in time. Newest Google Maps Enable this, to be compatible with the latest Google Maps.
